pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw:
Minor as well: This introduces frame notation, but doesn’t provide a reference for what it means.

Is it possible to add a link to the Model Kinematics tutorial - OR - is it possible to add this notation to the Pose Tutorial?

\(I may take a whack at submitting a PR to the Pose Tutorial to add this in.\)
content.html:
Minor as well: This introduces frame notation, but doesn’t provide a reference for what it means.

Is it possible to add a link to the Model Kinematics tutorial - OR - is it possible to add this notation to the Pose Tutorial?

(I may take a whack at submitting a PR to the Pose Tutorial to add this in.)
